azurerm_mssql_virtual_machine.description: Manages a Microsoft SQL Virtual Machine

virtual_machine_id.description: The ID of the Virtual Machine. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sql_license_type.description: The SQL Server license type. Possible values are `AHUB` (Azure Hybrid Benefit

sql_connectivity_port.description: The SQL Server port. Defaults to `1433`.

sql_connectivity_type.description: The connectivity type used for this SQL Server. Defaults to `PRIVATE`.

sql_connectivity_update_password.description: The SQL Server sysadmin login password.

sql_connectivity_update_username.description: The SQL Server sysadmin login to create.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

day_of_week.description: The day of week to apply the patch on.

maintenance_window_starting_hour.description: The Hour, in the Virtual Machine Time-Zone when the patching maintenance window should begin.

maintenance_window_duration_in_minutes.description: The size of the Maintenance Window in minutes.

key_vault_url.description: The azure Key Vault url. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

service_principal_name.description: The service principal name to access key vault. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

service_principal_secret.description: The service principal name secret to access key vault. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the SQL Virtual Machine.

create.description: Used when creating the MSSQL Virtual Machine.

update.description: Used when updating the MSSQL Virtual Machine.

read.description: Used when retrieving the MSSQL Virtual Machine.

delete.description: Used when deleting the MSSQL Virtual Machine.
